title: Collins and Foxman on Scaramucci (Audio)
itunes:title: Collins and Foxman on Scaramucci (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. (Carol Solo)\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Margaret Collins "Peggy," US Investing Team Leader/Personal Finance Reporter, and Simone Foxman, an Investing Reporter for Bloomberg, discuss Anthony Scaramucci, what was in his financial forms, and how it all relates to his job at the White House.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
